src:
Tak Banding, Vonis 20 Bulan Bui Penyuap Kepala Kantor Imigrasi Mataram Inkrah
01 Nov 2019, 10:09 by Tim detikcom
Mataram - Pengadilan Negeri (PN) Mataram, Nusa Tenggara Barat (NTB), menyatakan vonis hukuman pemberi suap Rp 1,2 miliar kepada pihak Imigrasi Mataram, Liliana Hidayat, sudah berstatus inkracht atau berkekuatan hukum tetap.Liliana dihukum 20 bulan penjara karena menyuap Kepala Kantor Imigrasi Mataram, Kurniadie.
Juru Bicara Pengadilan Negeri Tipikor Mataram Fathurrauzi mengatakan vonis hukumannya berstatus inkracht karena hingga batas akhir, Rabu (30/10), Jaksa Penuntut Umum KPK tidak mengajukan upaya hukum lanjutan.
"Vonisnya sudah inkracht Rabu kemarin. Jadi tinggal dieksekusi jaksa penuntut umum KPK," kata Fathurrauzi sebagiaman dikutip dari Antara, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Untuk Liliana Hidayat, sebelumnya sudah secara langsung menyatakan menerima putusannya usai dibacakan Majelis Hakim Pengadilan Negeri Mataram yang diketuai Isnurul Syamsul Arief, pada pekan lalu, Rabu (23/10).
Karenanya status Liliana Hidayat yang merupakan Direktur PT Wisata Bahagia Indonesia, perusahaan pemilik properti Wyndham Sundancer Lombok Resort, kini telah resmi menjadi terpidana korupsi yang akan menjalani masa pidana penjara sesuai putusannya, yakni satu tahun delapan bulan dengan denda Rp 200 juta subsider tiga bulan kurungan.
Terpisah, Jaksa Penuntut Umum KPK Taufiq Ibnugroho yang dihubungi wartawan di Mataram, membenarkan bahwa pihaknya tidak mengajukan upaya hukum lanjutan atau banding terkait putusan Liliana Hidayat.
"Kami terima. Selanjutnya kami siapkan untuk eksekusi putusan," kata Taufiq.

(asp/asp)
text:
No Appeals, 20-Month Sentence Bui Bribe Head of Mataram Inkrah Immigration Office
Nov 01 2019, 10:09 am by Tim detikcom
Mataram - District Court (PN) of Mataram, West Nusa Tenggara (NTB), stated the sentence of bribery giving Rp 1.2 billion to the Mataram Immigration, Liliana Hidayat, had inkracht status or permanent legal force. Liliana was sentenced to 20 months in prison for bribing the Chief Mataram Immigration Office, Kurniadie.
Spikor Mataram District Court Spathurrauzi Spokesman said the sentence was inkracht status because until the deadline, Wednesday (10/30), the KPK Public Prosecutor did not submit further legal remedies.
"The verdict was inkracht last Wednesday. So the KPK general prosecutor is just executed," Fathurrauzi said as quoted by Antara, Friday (11/01/2019).
As for Liliana Hidayat, previously she had directly stated that she accepted her decision after being read out by the Judges of the Mataram District Court, chaired by Isnurul Syamsul Arief, last week, Wednesday (10/23).
Because of this, Liliana Hidayat, who is the Director of PT Wisata Bahagia Indonesia, a property owner of the Wyndham Sundancer Lombok Resort, has now officially become a convicted of corruption who will undergo a prison sentence according to her decision, which is one year and eight months with a fine of Rp 200 million in a three-month confinement.
Separately, the KPK's Public Prosecutor Taufiq Ibnugroho, who was contacted by reporters in Mataram, confirmed that his party did not submit further legal action or appeals related to the decision of Liliana Hidayat.
"We accept. Then we prepare for the execution of the decision," said Taufiq.

(asp / asp)
